name: cellDensity
comments: from Baldwin WW, Myer R, Powell N, Anderson E, Koch AL. Buoyant density of Escherichia coli is determined solely by the osmolarity of the culture medium. Arch Microbiol. 1995 Aug164(2):155-7 p.156 fig.3 & fig.2 (retrieved from Bionumbers)

name: k_SpoT_ppGpp_synthesis
source: Derived from Murray and Bremer. JMB. 1996.

name: k_SpoT_ppGpp_degradation
source: Derived from Murray and Bremer. JMB. 1996.

name: fraction_supply_inhibited
source: Fraction of AA supply that will be inhibited at target conc. Determined empirically to support stable growth with tRNA charging. Can change with more detailed model or be fit to data.

name: fraction_supply_exported
source: Fraction of AA supply that will be exported at target conc. Determined empirically to support stable growth with tRNA charging. Can change with more detailed model or be fit to data.
